channel.title: User Authorizations on Qtlex API
channel.description: Recent content in User Authorizations on Qtlex API

item.title: User Authorization
item.description: Authoriazation of user Authorize users or modify user credentials. User authenication give access to particular api according to user type. Currently three type of user exists. Buyer Seller Admin Authenicate users You can authenicate users by sending post request with username and password through api. API call qtlex.qtlomics.com/api/v1/login Parameters parmeter required description q optional no parameter as such Examples of API calls curl -I --header "Content-Type: application/javascript" --request POST --data @request.
